titleStmt.title: Whereas one Thomas Percy, a gentleman pensioner to his Maiestie, is discouered to haue bene priuie to one of the most horrible treasons that euer was contriued, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: For his apprehension in connection with the Gunpowder Plot. Cf. STC.
Title from opening words of text.
Dated at end: Westminster, the fift day of Nouember, in the third yeere of our reigne ..
In this edition line two of the text has: priuie.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
